lines.text: Someday you're going to want something nice and expensive that you can't afford on a detective's salary.
You're a nice guy, Honest Joe, but you're not in the right league. I'm aiming for the World Series.
Take plenty of warm clothes. It's awful cold in the mountains.
Who gets cold on a honeymoon?

[about Joe after he beats up DeVito]
I thought he was an easy-going guy.
He was - until he got married.
